requires.query: SELECT APP_ID FROM APPLICATIONS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?
SELECT TENANT_ID FROM TENANTS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?

dev_cas.query: SELECT ARPTD_ID FROM APP_RPT_DEFINITIONS WHERE APP_ID = ?
SELECT DTT_CODE FROM DT_TYPES WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT UICG_CODE FROM UI_COMPONENT_GROUP WHERE CLIENT_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT WFTPA_ID FROM WF_INFO WHERE APP_ID = ?
SELECT APP_REQ_ID FROM APP_REQUIREMENTS WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT CODE FROM AQM_DESIGNER_CHANGES WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT DT_CODE FROM DATA_TEMPLATES WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT WFCMT_ID FROM WF_COMM_MESSAGE_TEMPLATES WHERE WFTPA_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT PROJECT_CODE FROM CCI_PROJECTS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?
SELECT UICG_DTTV_ID FROM UICG_DTT_VIEW WHERE UICG_CODE = ?  ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT BINDING_CODE FROM DATA_BINDINGS WHERE DT_CODE = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT DS_CODE FROM UICTRL_DATA_SOURCE WHERE APP_ID = ?

clt_cas.query: SELECT ST_ID FROM SYSTEM_TYPES WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?
SELECT LOGIN_NAME FROM USERS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT CLUSTER_CODE FROM CLUSTERS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?
SELECT APP_ID FROM APP_TENANTS WHERE TENANT_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT APPST_ID FROM APP_SYSTEM_TYPES WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT APPSTS_ID, STS_ID FROM APP_SYSTEM_TO_SYSTEM WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT U_ID, APPU_ID FROM APP_USERS WHERE APP_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT SHARING_MODE, SHARING_VALUE FROM APP_RPT_SHARING WHERE ARPTD_ID = ? ALLOW FILTERING
SELECT TENANT_NAME FROM TENANTS WHERE CLIENT_ID = ?

dep_cas.query: SELECT CATEGORY FROM MAPPING_INFO WHERE APP_ID = ?
SELECT COMMMT_CODE FROM COMM_INFO WHERE APP_ID = ? AND WFTPA_ID = ?
SELECT WFCA_ID FROM COMM_STATIC_ATTACHMENTS WHERE COMMMT_CODE = ? ALLOW FILTERING
